message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. My initial offer is $1,400,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position on the price, but $1,200,000 undervalues the unique benefits this product offers.  I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,300,000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $1,250,000? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchasing the product, but I need to stay within my means.
